text: Samantha Louise Taylor-Johnson (n√©e Taylor-Wood; born 4 March 1967) is a British movie director, singer, photographer and artist. She is known for directing Nowhere Boy (2009) and Fifty Shades of Grey (2015). Taylor-Johnson was appointed Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) in the 2011 Birthday Honours for services to the arts. In 2012, she married actor Aaron Taylor-Johnson.(23 June 2013) 50 Shades of Grey film to be directed by Sam Taylor-Johnson . Shepton Mallet Journal. Retrieved on 18 April 2015. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Sam Taylor-Wood on artnet * David Video David Beckham Sleeping Video at Liverpool Walker Gallery Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:British photographers Category:Movie producers from London Category:Movie directors from London Category:Screenwriters from London Category:Artists from London Category:Singers from London Category:British television directors Category:British television producers
title: Sam Taylor-Johnson
